getDueDate

public Date getDueDate(Process proc,
                       java.lang.Long orderId,
                       java.lang.Long orderItemId,
                       String operation)
Calculate the expected due date of the process participant.

Parameters:
proc - Business process object
orderId - Order Id.
orderItemId - Order item Id.
operation - Name of operation.
Returns:
Specifies the amount of time (Date) in which the activity should complete.

runDistributionScript

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object runDistributionScript(CwObject wi,
                                                              CwObject itemData,
                                                              Process process)
Call distribution script of the participant to decide if the task is assigned to user's worklist.

Parameters:
wi - worklist item which is to be distributed.
itemData - item data of the worklist document.
process - the user process which is managing the worklist.
Returns:
the string value representation of the user
